Title: Ride the East Wind, leap forward again and again!
Designer: Yuan Xiaocang (袁晓沧)Chen Dalin (陈达林)Xu Qinghua (徐庆华)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The car is a Dongfeng (东风, East Wind) CA71, China's first car taken in actual production, late 1958.This print is from the second impression (January 1959).
